mutation_intent: Force static-only deployment via YAML configuration
expected_behavior: AWS Amplify respects renderType: 'Static' and deploys as static site
observed_behavior: AWS Amplify continues searching for required-server-files.json (SSR artifact)
contradiction_hypothesis: CloudFormation stack drift and cached Amplify artifacts override YAML mutations

root_cause_analysis.primary: AWS Amplify auto-detection overrides explicit configuration
root_cause_analysis.secondary: CloudFormation stack contains SSR Lambda functions from initial detection
root_cause_analysis.tertiary: Amplify cache layer preserves SSR routing despite static mutations

remediation_required: 1. Manual CloudFormation stack inspection and SSR Lambda removal
2. Amplify cache purge via amplify delete --force
4. Explicit platform override in AWS Console
